page.title: 10ST.MARY'S SCHOOL, PULBOROUGH
page.content: I walk to school every morning. School starts at 8.45a.m. The first thing we do is get our books from our trays, and read.Assembly is at 9.00a.m. On Wednesday we have Hymn Practice. Daily the teacher takes the register to see who's here and who's having dinner or sandwiches. I have dinner. We have lessons in Maths,English,Science,Art and Projects. At the end of school we have a story.I like Projects and Art. At 10.30a.m we have a playtime.We go on the playground,the field or the climbing frames. We play games like French Elastic,Red Rover and Black Rabbit.If it's raining we stay in class and read or draw.On Monday and Wednesday we go in the swimming pool.For games we play Football, Netball,Rounders and Swimming.We play games on the field.Before going home at 3.15pm. we have a story.
